Name: Statue of Hor, Son of Djeddjehutiuofankh
Description: This statue depicts Hor wearing a short straight wig and squatting with his legs bent up against his chest. His arms are crossed and resting on his knees. The statue is decorated with five horizontal hieroglyphic lines that list his name and titles. The back of the statue is in the form of a hill, in reference to the famous, ancient Iat Hill.
